entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 25 March 2023
